content: MFT-CH Clamps Clamp for concealed fastening of facade panels ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Accessories for façade systems- ### FEATURES:Features Clean appearance with concealed fastening points Innovative new hole pattern allows increased efficiency and flexibility, tailored to the installers needs. Engineering support available – contact your local Hilti team for project-specific advice on optimizing the ventilated façade substructure Total system solution – from Hilti you get optimized tools, consumables and services for every step of ventilated façade installation Applications Stainless steel mounting clamp for concealed fastening of facade panels For fixing the panels until complete load transfer by the load bearing adhesive is given ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Clamps: A2 (1.4301) Technical Data | Material composition | Clamps: A2 (1.4301) ### ITEMS- 2246268 - Edge clamp MFT-CHE 8,5 A2 - Package Size 100 pc - 2246269 - Clamp MFT-CHB 8,5 A2 - Package Size 100 pc - 2246430 - Middle clamp MFT-CHM 8,5 A2 - Package Size 100 pc
